name: Pixel Art Font Pack
description:
Making non-copyright fonts for your game can take a lot of time, time you could also have spent on your game. So why don’t buy fonts? Is it worth it to spent multiple hours on one font if you can also buy them for only one dollar?

I made these fonts for my previous game, but since I do not need them anymore. it would be a shame to do nothing with them. That is why I'm selling them to everyone who wants to save themselves the time and effort.

License

These fonts are licenced under creative commons: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/4.0/. 

Information

- compatible with smaller resolution games.
- available for commercial use
- saves you time
- cheap
- different sizes
